name: Facebook Ads Performance Dashboard
description: Monitor your Facebook Ads campaigns in real-time with comprehensive performance metrics and ROI analysis.

name: Campaign ROI Tracker
description: Track return on investment across all your Facebook Ad campaigns with detailed analytics and insights.

name: Audience Insights Dashboard
description: Deep dive into your audience demographics, interests, and behavior patterns with interactive visualizations.

name: Ad Spend Analysis
description: Analyze your ad spending trends across different campaigns and channels to optimize your budget allocation.

name: Conversion Funnel Dashboard
description: Visualize your complete conversion funnel from ad impression to final conversion with detailed step analytics.

name: Real-time Performance Monitor
description: Monitor your campaigns in real-time as they run, with instant alerts for anomalies and opportunities.
